title: In The Heat Of The Moment
description: In a fit of anger or in the grip of fear, many of us make decisions that we never would have anticipated. This week, we look at situations that make us strangers to ourselves — and why it's so difficult to remember what these "hot states" feel like once the moment is over.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
